https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9yDqzfwhpuO3IcAjE1a0Xfq8Apg.jpg After Kelly broke up with Rick, her abusive boyfriend, her friends had a slumber party to cheer her up. As they are telling horror stories, there is a killer in the house coming for them. Bloody Slumber Party
